m_szDocTitle: Systems for Learning User Preferences and Generating Recommendations to make Settings at Connected Vehicles and Interfacing with Cloud Systems - PENILLA ANGEL A.
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- HELP Title: Systems for Learning User Preferences and Generating Recommendations to make Settings at Connected Vehicles and Interfacing with Cloud Systems United States Patent Application 20160080500 Kind                 Code: A1 Abstract: A cloud system that includes one or more servers for communicating with vehicles and processing information received from a vehicle and processing information sent to the vehicle is provided. The system enables establishing a communication link between a computing device associated with the vehicle and a server of the cloud s
